fr.sii.ogham.email.sender.impl.sendgrid.handler

Interface SendGridContentHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapContentHandler, MultiContentHandler, StringContentHandler

    public interface SendGridContentHandler
    Description of the operations a content handler used with emails sent to SendGrid should implement. To have content handlers separate from senders improves extensibility, as content types can be added in the future without having to modify the sender class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setContent(com.sendgrid.SendGrid.Email email, Content content)
      Reads the content and adds it into the email.

    • Method Detail

      • setContent

        void setContent(com.sendgrid.SendGrid.Email email,
                Content content)
         throws ContentHandlerException
        Reads the content and adds it into the email. This method is expected to update the content of the email parameter.
        Parameters:
        email - the email to put the content in
        content - the unprocessed content
        Throws:
        ContentHandlerException - the handler is unable to add the content to the email
